actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the University of Utah a portion of the property constituting Fort Douglas, Utah.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey to the University of Utah all Federal rights and interest in certain portions of property comprising Fort Douglas, Utah, subject to certain conditions. Retains a Federal reversionary interest in such property if the University uses it for other than educational or research purposes.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the University of Utah a portion of the property constituting Fort Douglas, Utah.
